Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
12/7 3:05PM - It was so good seeing you all this weekend! The mountain is in great shape, and its only getting better from here. Tomorrow, 44 trails will be ready to ride, with 34 of them dressed in fresh stripes thanks to our amazing Grooming Team. Weve got 7 lifts set to spin at 9am, with the possibility of wind delays, so stay tuned to the Mountain Report for updates. Temperatures dip tomorrow ranging from 26 degrees up top and 1216 degrees at the base. It never hurts to pack some extra layers so be sure to bundle up and keep that face covered. Thanks for an awesome weekend and I cant wait to kick off another great day with you tomorrow.

Black Bear is currently closed. Only the top portion is open to reach Polar Bear which is a black diamond trail. For more intermediate terrain, head over to Janeway Junction from the summit.

Our Mountain Operations Team is on a roll! Compared to this time last year, the Snowmaking Team has made over 25% more snow to kick off the 2025-2026 season allowing us to enjoy some stellar early season conditions. With how unpredictable the weather can be in our beautiful state, they are working around the clock and going above and beyond to make sure the mountain is in the best possible shape it can be. With soon to be 200 acres of skiable terrain, we don't plan on slowing down anytime soon. If you happen to know or see a member of the Operations team, be sure to give thanks for all the hard work they do to enhance our experience! Click here to read more about exciting advancements for the 2025-2026 season.

Safety Tip: Know the skier and rider code. It is your responsibility.

Kids Ski Free Week is BACK! Now through December 12 skiers & riders under 17 can SKI FREE at Stratton! Whether you are first-timers or mini-pros, a free week of mountain fun is waiting. Dont miss out on this fantastic week! 

Want to go on an adventure of a lifetime? Well, you're in luck, our Guided Snowmobile Tours are back! Explore Stratton after hours with friends and family on a tour to the summit. Be sure to book your spot now to guarantee your spot.

The Nordic Center is now open for Snowshoeing! Enjoy a peaceful walk through 10km of trails with friends or family. Once more snow lands, well be chewing at the bit to get the Nordic Center up and running! 

The last day to buy an Ikon pass is December 11. Buy Now before its too late! With 60+ destinations worldwide, you can explore winter to its fullest, from backyard missions to bucket list dreams.

Uphill travel is open! You must get a pass from guest services and read the policy online. Please keep in mind that there are designated travel routes with or without snow.

Time to lock in on your winter fun! Enroll in a high-performance adventure this season. This winter, accelerate your ability level through guided seasonal programs and specialty workshops with the Stratton Mountain Sports School. Seasonal Programs are the best way to turn your little one into a lifetime skier or snowboarder, with a strong foundation of skills, in a discipline they enjoy most. Seasonal Programs focus on fun at an early age, followed by specialty disciplines such as freestyle skiing and snowboarding, ski racing, freeriding, and more. These programs are offered for all ages, including adults, so it's never too late to join!

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability
_inspectorSnowReport.Alert: Lot 1 & Lot 2 are now full. All parking is at Sun Bowl. Shuttle service is available. There is no lift service or trails open to ski back. The lodge is open for bathrooms only.
